title: Russell Peters
description:
Kevin talks to comedian Russell Peters about his start in stand-up in Canada, how comedian Patrice O’Neal helped mentor him towards success, and how he tapped into the immigrant market and became a worldwide sensation.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds!
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (kevin hart, russell peters)
